Package org.treetank.service.xml.serialize Description

Serializer Package

All class in this package are for getting data out of Treetank. This includes the export of single XML Instances plus the complete dump of XML with all versions.

The most used way to get data out of Treetank is with the help of OutputStreams.

Author:
Marc Kramis, University of Konstanz, Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
